metadata.title: CVE-2016-2448 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: media/libmediaplayerservice/nuplayer/NuPlayerStreamListener.cpp inmediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-05-01 does not properly validate entry datastructures, which allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystemaccess, aka internal bug 27533704.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
